authors.affiliation: Integrated Islet Distribution Program and Human Islet Phenotyping Program

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7pkr0","text":"This Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) provides Human Islet Phenotyping Program (HIPP) procedures for DNA extraction from frozen islet pellets using the Promega WizardÂ® Genomic DNA Purfication Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":198},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":198}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"astrk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6anjn","text":"This SOP defines the assay method used by the Human Islet Phenotyping Program (HIPP) for quantitative and qualitative determination of the Purified Human Pancreatic Islet product, post-shipment, manufactured for use in the National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases (NIDDK)-sponsored research in the Integrated Islet Distribution Program (IIDP).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9po3a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ih0u","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3rlo7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":54,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"dv1nj","text":"This Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) #: HIPP-11-v01","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

groups.title: Integrated Islet Distribution Program and Human Islet Phenotyping Program

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"8gbho","text":"Integrated Islet Distribution Program (IIDP) (RRID:SCR_014387): The IIDP is a grant funded program commissioned and funded by the NIDDK to provide quality human islets to the diabetes research community to advance scientific discoveries and translational medicine. The IIDP consists of the NIDDK Project Scientist and Program Official, the External Scientific Panel and the CC at City of Hope (COH). The IIDP CC integrates an interactive group of academic laboratories including the subcontracted IIDP centers.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":64}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":15}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ordj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95h3h","text":"IIDP Coordinating Center (CC): Joyce Niland, Ph.D. and Carmella Evans-Molina, M.D., Ph.D. serve as Co-Principal Investigators (Co-PIs) for the IIDP Program located within the Department of Diabetes and Cancer Discovery Science at COH to coordinate the activities of the IIDP and Human Islet Phenotyping Program (HIPP). Dr. Niland, contact PI, oversees the daily activity of the IIDP staff, provides informatics/ biostatistical input, and subcontracts with the Islet Isolation Centers (IICs) to ensure the delivery of the highest quality human islets to IIDP-approved investigators. Dr. Evans-Molina serves as the liaison to the HIPP, interacting closely to ensure that extensive, high quality phenotypic data are collected on islets distributed by the IICs. She also facilitates the delivery of this information to both the IICs and the IIDP-approved investigators, while responding to questions, issues, or suggestions for further HIPP enhancements.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":30}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erqqd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7nltq","text":"Human Islet Phenotyping Program (HIPP): The HIPP is a subcontracted entity of the IIDP through the COH and Vanderbilt University. The HIPP is directed by Marcela Brissova, Ph.D. and is responsible for performing specific standardized quality control assays agreed upon by both the IIDP and the HIPP, in order to provide enhanced, quality data on the human islets post-shipment, to the IIDP. The results of these assays will be approved by the CC and posted on the IIDP website for both the centers and the approved investigators to access.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"428C6EA093EB11ECA6CB85416090B427","url":"https://scicrunch.org/resources/Tools/record/nlx_144509-1/SCR_014387/resolver?q=*\u0026l=\u0026facet%5B%5D=Related%20Condition:Diabetes\u0026sort=rel\u0026preference=off"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and itâs working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b7fbu","text":"Make Nuclei Lysis Buffer: Mix   Nuclei Lysis Solution with   0.5M EDTA PH 8.0. Chill on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6qfl4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"0197B360958911EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"120","error":false,"guid":"0B088A50958911EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b111a","text":"Add   chilled Nuclei Lysis Buffer and   proteinase K to the islet pellet. Vortex vigorously for 10 seconds. Incubate at   for 30 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9h31t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"254A5790958911EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"2C25B690958911EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"45A78F30958911EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6d1vc","text":"Add   RNase Solution to the islet lysate and mix by inverting the tube 2-5 times. Incubate at   for 30 minutes. Cool to room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3841l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"6B07BC50958911EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"71FF2ED0958911EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hrd7","text":"Add   Protein Precipitation Solution. Vortex and incubate on ice for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4113f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"28DBC640958A11EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ft7rn","text":"Centrifuge at 13,000-16,000 xg (maximum speed of microcentrifuge) for 5 minutes at   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8d6g9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3A86A1D0958A11EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e73q6","text":"Transfer supernatant to a clean 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tube containing   room temperature isopropanol. Mix gently by inversion. Incubate at   for 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":140,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2uveu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"52F92D50958A11EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"5B68E7F0958A11EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c2i1h","text":"Centrifuge at 13,000-16,000 xg for 1 minute at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eatcr","text":"Remove supernatant and add   room temperature 70% ethanol. Mix gently by inversion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ou1h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"9D6BDCC0958A11EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5o79d","text":"Aspirate the ethanol and air-dry the pellet for 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bc7ls","text":"Rehydrate the DNA in   of DNA Rehydration Solution for 30 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d30g3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"CBCC6BC0958A11EC9E012F30662715A3","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bfib","text":"Document any deviations that occurred during this protocol that affect the final results and report with the analysis of the assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dpam8","text":"To facilitate data management and ensure data security, the Vanderbilt HIPP uses an institutional server-based platform for data storage and analysis.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4i04l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tjh","text":"Upon completion of image acquisition and analysis, annotated images containing metadata, image analysis outputs, and documentation of any deviations and repetitions that are warranted will be uploaded to the IIDP-HIPP database and disseminated to IIDP-affiliated investigators and islet isolation centers.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
